summary: Build a Trendoscope-style ecommerce website to sell Pine Script digital downloads, with categories, bundles, Stripe checkout, and an admin portal including invite-only access tracking.
architectural_notes: Add a profile/account UI section that reads and displays the authenticated Internet Identity principal (for easy copy/paste), without relying on email addresses.

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity login and role-protected admin access so that only authorized principals can access the admin dashboard and admin actions.
Create the core data model and CRUD APIs for categories and ensure products can be listed and filtered by category (e.g., Indicators, Strategies, Bundles, Free/Premium).
Create the bundle product model and CRUD APIs so an admin can define a bundle that includes multiple products under a single price, and the storefront can display bundle detail pages.
Implement file upload and secure storage for downloadable Pine Script files (.pine/.txt) associated with products and/or bundles, using backend-managed access control and stable storage.
Implement one-time purchase checkout flow using Stripe: create a checkout session for a selected product or bundle, handle payment confirmation, and record an order granting download permissions.
Implement a secure digital delivery system: downloads must require authorization (purchase-based), and download links must be time-limited and/or single-use tokens issued by the backend.

Build the Trendoscope-style storefront UI with pages: Homepage (hero + featured products), category listings, product detail pages (screenshots, instructions, code preview, disclaimer, buy/download CTA), bundle detail pages, and a basic purchases/downloads page.
Create an admin dashboard UI that supports managing: products, categories, bundles, pricing, Stripe settings, uploads, and viewing orders/sales history.

Implement invite-only access tracking for products that require manual TradingView invites: store customer TradingView username and allow admin to mark access status (granted, expired, username incorrect) per purchase/customer-product.
Add legal/compliance pages with editable content blocks: Disclaimer, Terms, Refund Policy, and Privacy Policy, and link them in the site footer.

Define and apply a coherent visual theme (not blue/purple by default): dark premium trading aesthetic with a single high-contrast accent color, consistent typography, spacing, and component styling across storefront and admin.
Add generated static brand assets (logo + simple icon) and wire them into the header, favicon, and basic marketing sections without routing images through the backend.

Add an authenticated user-facing profile/account area that displays the currently logged-in Internet Identity Principal ID as copyable text (e.g., a “Your Principal ID” section) so users can paste it when requesting admin access.
Expose a clear navigation path to the new/existing profile/account area from the storefront header/navigation so users can reliably find their Principal ID after signing in.
Ensure the Principal ID display is derived directly from the active Internet Identity session (the current identity) and updates correctly after login/logout without requiring a full page refresh.

new_feature_requests.summary: Trendoscope-style storefront UI/UX (dark modern trading theme) with homepage, navigation, product cards, and product detail pages
Product management for Pine Script downloads (create/edit products with title, description, screenshots, instructions, code preview, disclaimer, price/free flag)
Category system for scripts (e.g., Indicators, Strategies, Bundles, Free/Premium) with category listing pages
Bundle products that package multiple scripts under one price (single package download or multiple downloads)
Stripe payments integration for one-time purchases including backend Stripe settings panel (keys, test/live toggle, webhook secret, currency)
Secure digital delivery system (post-payment download page, protected files, expiring/authorized download links, order-to-download permissions)
Admin dashboard with role-protected admin access to manage products, categories, bundles, pricing, uploads, and view sales/orders
Invite-only access tracking in admin (capture customer TradingView username; track access granted/expired/username incorrect for scripts that require manual invite)
Legal/compliance pages and content blocks (disclaimer, terms, refund policy, privacy policy)

Create the core data model and CRUD APIs for products (Pine Script downloads) including: title, slug, short/long description, price amount, currency, free/paid flag, category, screenshots (static asset references), instructions, code preview text, disclaimer text, and flags for invite-only access requirements.
Implement Stripe settings in the backend with an admin-editable configuration section including: secret key, publishable key, webhook secret, test/live mode toggle, and default currency.
Display the logged-in Internet Identity Principal ID in the user profile/account area (e.g., a “Your Principal ID” section) so users can copy it for admin access requests
